name: XML with redundant close tag
description: Find XML tags which contain no child tags but do include an ending tag. Can be used to replace <TAG></TAG> by <TAG />
content:
hello
sdfsdf<TAG blablabla="sdfsdf"></TAG>sdfsdf
<TAG blablabla />
<TAG>sdsd</TAG>
<TAG blablabla>123</TAG>
<TAG blablabla><sdf></TAG>
sdfsdf<TAG></TAG>sdf
sdfsdfsdf<TAG blablabla>            		


</TAG>sdfsdfsdf
